subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Sports Injuries
Philanthropy
lead_paragraph: Mr. Twyman, a Hall of Fame basketball player, became the legal guardian for his teammate Maurice Stokes, who sustained a paralyzing brain injury during the 1958 season.
snippet: Mr. Twyman, a Hall of Fame basketball player, became the legal guardian for his teammate Maurice Stokes, who sustained a paralyzing brain injury during the 1958 season.
